"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This song represents determination and overcoming obstacles, which are essential qualities for achieving success in any endeavor.
"Hakuna Matata" from The Lion King - This upbeat and乐观 song reminds us to live in the moment and enjoy life's simple pleasures.
"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - This classic rock anthem encourages listeners to never give up on their dreams and to always have hope for a better future.
"The Scientist" by Coldplay - This introspective ballad explores themes of regret and self-reflection, encouraging listeners to learn from their mistakes and move forward.
"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - This feel-good song promotes positivity and happiness, reminding us that we can find joy in everyday moments.
